name: Parasolled (Demo)
description:
Welcome to Parasolled!

This is a platformer where you play as a cute slime-like creature. The rules are simple: just like in most other platformer games you need to get to the end of the location avoiding various threats and overcoming obstacles.

However, Parasolled provides you with a unique tool that can help you in any situation – a parasol. Use your parasol to soar above the abyss, move objects and press buttons.

It can also be useful in combat - master the throw of a parasol and also use it as a shield.

In Parasolled you will discover these and many other features of this versatile tool.

Please note that this is a Demo version of the game.

Languages
  • English
  • Русский
